title: Native Android Developer
full_description: A growing telecom organization here in Denver is looking for a native Android Developer to join their team on an on-going contract basis - Diversant has helped this particular team grow and they'd like to find 2 more Devs to join their team ASAP. High-level details below. If you're interested, apply here or send your resume and github link to eredington@diversant.com!Collaborative team working on modern TV/streaming solutions for Android apps. The need Mid-Sr level Developers with Kotlin and Java experience.
